snippet.title: Balatro - Friends of Jimbo (Pack 3) | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
You still can't spell "collaboration" without "Balatro"

Add some visual flair to your decks with these new cosmetic card skins inspired by fan-favorite characters from Divinity Original Sin 2, Shovel Knight, Potion Craft, Enter The Gungeon, Cult of the Lamb, Don't Starve, 1000xRESIST & Warframe. This update is now available free of charge on PC, Consoles & Mobile

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2379780/Balatro/
Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/balatro-switch/
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010334
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/balatro/9PK087LNGJC5
Apple Arcade: https://tinyurl.com/mrxvbcmu
Apple App Store: https://tinyurl.com/3ek4bwem
Google Play Store: https://tinyurl.com/vtkzj64s
